channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 重大新闻：参议院少数党领袖米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）是参议院历史上任职时间最长的党魁，他表示将在近二十年后的十一月卸任领导职务
item.description:
Breaking: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell, the longest-serving Senate party leader in history, said he will step down from his leadership role in November after almost two decades https://t.co/3VHSyPTBYD https://t.co/3VHSyPTBYD

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: "胆小者勿入"穆特博物馆收集人体器官已有 160 年历史。捐赠者命名为 "毁灭者海尔格 "的肿瘤被困在仓库里，博物馆正在讨论它的未来。
item.description:
“Not for the squeamish.” The Mütter Museum has been collecting human body parts for 160 years. A tumor its donor named “Helga the Destroyer” is stuck in storage while the museum debates its future. https://t.co/KyonVoa9b1 https://t.co/KyonVoa9b1

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 航空公司希望您使用他们的贵宾室。旅行信用卡也是如此。在丹佛，争夺贵宾室时间的竞争最为激烈。

item.title: 🧵 十七个月前，《华尔街日报》记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）在俄罗斯采访时被拘留。#与埃文同行
item.description:
🧵Eleven months ago, Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich was detained in Russia during a reporting trip.

He remains in a Moscow prison to this day.

We’re offering resources for those who want to show their support for him. #IStandWithEvan https://t.co/ll83UMXlp5 pic.twitter.com/56xLaYBk4f

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：乌克兰和波兰因谷物进口问题关系紧张。华尔街日报》解释了争端背后的原因，以及它为何在这两个盟国之间制造矛盾。

item.title: 纽约游骑兵队前锋马特-雷姆普（Matt Rempe）是冰球运动早期更暴力时代的回光返照。在他参加的前五场 NHL 比赛中，他已经打了三场架，而且他对此乐此不疲。
